docs.snippet: LEAD: Afraid that the Bush Administration will give away too much during international negotiations, the domestic textile industry is preparing another legislative push during this election year seeking import restrictions.

docs.snippet: LEAD:    GOLF       Kartzmann Gains, Beating Cash       Ninth-seeded Mark Kartzmann of Australia survived a tie breaker in the second set to defeat Pat Cash, also of Australia, 6-4, 6-7, 6-4, in the first round of the Japan Open in Tokyo yesterday....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: GOLF Kartzmann Gains, Beating Cash Ninth-seeded Mark Kartzmann of Australia survived a tie breaker in the second set to defeat Pat Cash, also of Australia, 6-4, 6-7, 6-4, in the first round of the Japan Open in Tokyo yesterday. Amos Mansdorf of Israel, seeded 10th, and Milan Srejber of Czechoslovakia, 13th, also advanced to the second round.
